General.Name: Zuger Kantonalbank
General.Description: Zuger Kantonalbank provides various banking products and services to private and corporate clients in Switzerland. It offers private banking products comprising bank accounts and debit and credit cards; private, savings, and rent deposit accounts; investment advisory, asset management, news and market analysis, and online financial investment services; investment products; home financing services, including mortgage and home ownership service; and pension products, financial planning, and tax services. The company also provides corporate banking products and services, such as corporate savings accounts and corporate cards; corporate and real estate financing services; occupational pension schemes; and foundation and succession planning services. In addition, it offers e-banking, mobile banking, and QR-bill payment services. Further, the company engages in the security trading, exchange transaction, and foreign exchange and precious metal trading business. Zuger Kantonalbank was founded in 1892 and is based in Zug, Switzerland.
